name: AFrame.Primitives.Light

values.name: intensity
values.comment: Light strength.

values.name: light
values.comment: The light primitive adjusts the lighting setup of the scene.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: type_
values.comment:
Set light type.

  Check https://aframe.io/docs/0.5.0/components/light.html#properties to get more information about the different kinds of lights

name: AFrame.Primitives

values.name: assetItem
values.comment:
An individual asset item. Asset items load an asset up front
and can be referenced as a source later on. Use a src attribute
to define what to load and specify an id which is used later on
to use this asset as a source.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: assets
values.comment: The assets group is used to store assets that are pre-loaded
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: box
values.comment:
The box primitive, formerly called <a-cube>,
    creates shapes such as boxes, cubes, or walls.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: circle
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: colladaModel
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: cone
values.comment: The cone primitive creates a cone shape.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: cursor
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: curvedimage
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: cylinder
values.comment:
The cylinder primitive is an entity that
    prescribes the geometry with its geometric primitive set to cylinder.
    It can be used to create tubes and curved surfaces.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: dodecahedron
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: gltfModel
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: icosahedron
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: image
values.comment: The image primitive shows an image on a flat plane.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: link
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: objModel
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: octahedron
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: plane
values.comment: The plane primitive creates flat surfaces.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: ring
values.comment: The ring primitive creates a ring or disc shape.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: sky
values.comment:
The sky primitive adds a background to a scene
    or display a 360-degree photo.
    It is an entity that prescribes a large sphere with the material
    mapped to the inside.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: sound
values.comment: The sound primitive wraps a sound component
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: sphere
values.comment: The sphere primitive creates a spherical or polyhedron shapes.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: tetrahedron
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: text
values.comment: The text primitive displays a text.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: torus
values.comment: The torus primitive creates a donut or circular tube shape.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: torusKnot
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: triangle
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: video
values.comment: The video primitive shows a video on a flat plane.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: videosphere
values.comment: The videosphere primitive shows a video on a sphere.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

name: AFrame.Primitives.Cursor

values.name: cursor
values.comment:
The cursor primitive places a reticle or crosshair to add clicking
    and interactivity with the scene.
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: fuse
values.comment: Whether cursor should also be fuse-based.

values.name: maxDistance
values.comment: Maximum distance to check for intersections on entities for clicks.

values.name: raycaster
values.comment: Customize the raycasting pieces of the cursor.

values.name: timeout
values.comment: How long to wait (in milliseconds) to trigger a click event if fuse-based.

name: AFrame.Primitives.Attributes

values.name: decay
values.comment: Amount the light dims along the distance of the light.

values.name: vrModeUi
values.comment:
The vr-mode-ui component toggles UI such as an Enter VR button, compatibility modal, and orientation modal for mobile.
The vr-mode-ui component applies only to the `<a-scene>` element.

name: AFrame.Primitives.Camera

values.name: camera
values.comment:
The camera primitive places the user somewhere within the scene.

    camera [] []
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: far
values.comment: Camera frustum far clipping plane.

values.name: fov
values.comment: Field of view (in degrees).

values.name: lookControlsEnabled
values.comment:
Enable look controls.

    camera [ lookControlsEnabled False ] []

values.name: near
values.comment: Camera frustum near clipping plane.

values.name: wasdControlsEnabled
values.comment:
Enable WASD controls for camera.

    camera [ wasdControlsEnabled False ] []

name: AFrame.Extra.Physics

values.name: dynamicBody
values.comment:
A freely-moving object.
    Dynamic bodies have mass, collide with other objects,
    bounce or slow during collisions, and fall if gravity is enabled.

    box [ dynamicBody ] []

values.name: grid
values.comment:
Floor.

    grid [ staticBody ] []
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: kinematicBody
values.comment:
Player-controlled body, which can move but is not affected (directly)
    by the physics engine. Intended for use on the player's model.
    Gravity and collisions are simulated,
    without giving full control to the physics engine.

    box [ kinematicBody ] []

values.name: staticBody
values.comment:
A fixed-position or animated object.
    Other objects may collide with static bodies,
    but static bodies themselves are unaffected by gravity and collisions.

    box [ staticBody ] []

name: AFrame

values.name: entity
values.comment:
An entity is represented by the <a-entity> element.
    As defined in the entity-component-system pattern,
    entities are placeholder objects to which we plug in components
    to in order to provide them apperance, behavior, and functionality.

    entity [ rotation 90 0 0 ] []
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: scene
values.comment:
A scene is represented by the <a-scene> element.
    The scene is the global root object,
    and all entities are contained within the scene.

    main =
        scene [] [ box [] [] ]
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

name: AFrame.Animations

values.name: animation
values.comment:
Animation declaration.

    box
        []
        [ animation
            [ attribute "rotation"
            , dur 10000
            , fill "forwards"
            , to "0 360 0"
            , repeat "indefinite"
            ]
            []
        ]
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> List (Html.Html msg) -> Html.Html msg

values.name: attribute_
values.comment:
Attribute to animate.

    animation [ attribute "rotation" ] []

values.name: begin
values.comment:
Delay (in milliseconds) or event name to wait on before beginning animation.

    animation [ begin 5000 ] []

values.name: direction
values.comment:
Direction of the animation (between from and to).
    One of alternate, alternateReverse, normal, reverse.

    animation [ direction "reverse" ] []

values.name: dur
values.comment:
Duration in (milliseconds) of the animation.

    animation [ dur 5000 ] []

values.name: easing
values.comment:
Easing function of the animation.

    animation [ easing "rotation" ] []

values.name: fill
values.comment:
Determines effect of animation when not actively in play.
    One of backwards, both, forwards, none.

    animation [ fill "rotation" ] []

values.name: from
values.comment:
Starting value.

    animation [ from "0 120 0" ] []

values.name: repeat
values.comment:
Repeat count or indefinite.

    animation [ repeat "5000" ] []

values.name: to
values.comment:
Ending value. Must be specified.

    animation [ to "0 360 0" ] []
